scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') === -1) throw new Error('You must use Yarn to install dependencies')"
scripts.build-dll-bundleanalyzer: cross-env APP_ENV=staging PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 webpack --config webpack.dll.config.js --env bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-dll-buildstats: cross-env APP_ENV=staging PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 webpack --config webpack.dll.config.js --env buildStats
scripts.build-dll-bundleanalyzer:dev: cross-env APP_ENV=development PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 webpack --config webpack.dll.config.js --env bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-dll-buildstats:dev: cross-env APP_ENV=development PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 webpack --config webpack.dll.config.js --env buildStats
scripts.build-dll-bundleanalyzer:beta: cross-env APP_ENV=beta PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 webpack --config webpack.dll.config.js --env bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-dll-buildstats:beta: cross-env APP_ENV=beta PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 webpack --config webpack.dll.config.js --env buildStats
scripts.build-dll-bundleanalyzer:prod: cross-env APP_ENV=production PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 webpack --config webpack.dll.config.js --env bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-dll-buildstats:prod: cross-env APP_ENV=production PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 webpack --config webpack.dll.config.js --env buildStats
scripts.start: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:dev && cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development webpack serve --env federation
scripts.start-bundleanalyzer: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:dev && cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development webpack serve --env federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.start-buildstats: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:dev && cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development webpack serve --env federation buildStats
scripts.build:dev: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:dev && yarn build-w-rm:dev
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:dev: cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development webpack --env federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer:dev: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:dev && yarn build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:dev
scripts.build-buildstats-w-rm:dev: cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development webpack --env federation buildStats
scripts.build-buildstats:dev: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:dev && yarn build-buildstats-w-rm:dev
scripts.build: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll && yarn build-w-rm
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm: cross-env BE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=staging webpack --env federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll && yarn build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm
scripts.build-buildstats-w-rm: cross-env BE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=staging webpack --env federation buildStats
scripts.build-buildstats: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll && yarn build-buildstats-w-rm
scripts.build:beta: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:beta && yarn build-w-rm:beta
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:beta: cross-env BE_ENV=beta APP_ENV=beta webpack --env federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer:beta: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:beta && yarn build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:beta
scripts.build-buildstats-w-rm:beta: cross-env BE_ENV=beta APP_ENV=beta webpack --env federation buildStats
scripts.build-buildstats:beta: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:beta && yarn build-buildstats-w-rm:beta
scripts.build:beta-stg: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:beta && yarn build-w-rm:beta-stg
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:beta-stg: cross-env BE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=beta webpack --env federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer:beta-stg: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:beta && yarn build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:beta-stg
scripts.build-buildstats-w-rm:beta-stg: cross-env BE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=beta webpack --env federation buildStats
scripts.build-buildstats:beta-stg: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:beta && yarn build-buildstats-w-rm:beta-stg
scripts.build:prod: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:prod && yarn build-w-rm:prod
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:prod: cross-env BE_ENV=production APP_ENV=production webpack --env federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer:prod: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:beta && yarn build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:prod
scripts.build-buildstats-w-rm:prod: cross-env BE_ENV=production APP_ENV=production webpack --env federation buildStats
scripts.build-buildstats:prod: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:prod && yarn build-buildstats-w-rm:prod
scripts.build:prod-stg: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:prod && yarn build-w-rm:prod-stg
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:prod-stg: cross-env BE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=production webpack --env federation bundleAnalyzer
scripts.build-bundleanalyzer:prod-stg: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:prod && yarn build-bundleanalyzer-w-rm:prod-stg
scripts.build-buildstats-w-rm:prod-stg: cross-env BE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=production webpack --env federation buildStats
scripts.build-buildstats:prod-stg: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-dll:prod && yarn build-buildstats-w-rm:prod-stg
scripts.lint: yarn lint-js && yarn lint-css && yarn prettier --check .
scripts.lint:fix: yarn lint-js:fix && yarn lint-css:fix && yarn prettier:fix .
